## Description {#details}

This file provides the interface for the pass responsible for both simplifying and canonicalizing the CFG.

<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass iteratively simplifies the entire CFG of a function. It may change</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// or remove control flow to put the CFG into a canonical form expected by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// other passes of the mid-level optimizer. Depending on the specified options,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it may further optimize control-flow to create non-canonical forms.</span></CodeLine>
